template.subject: Open Records Request - [SPECIFIC DESCRIPTION]
template.body:
To the Records Custodian:

Pursuant to Iowa Code Chapter 22, I respectfully request access to the following public records:

[DETAILED DESCRIPTION OF RECORDS REQUESTED]

This request is made under Iowa's Open Records Act, which provides that every person has the right to examine, copy, and disseminate public records.

Please provide the records in the following format: [SPECIFY: copies, electronic format, inspection, etc.]

Contact Information:
Name: [YOUR FULL NAME]
Address: [YOUR COMPLETE ADDRESS]
Phone: [YOUR PHONE NUMBER]
Email: [YOUR EMAIL ADDRESS]

I understand that under Iowa Code Chapter 22, you should ordinarily respond within 10 business days and no later than 20 calendar days. Please acknowledge receipt of this request and provide the records within the statutory timeframe.

If any portion of this request contains exempt information under Iowa Code Chapter 22.7, please identify the specific exemption and provide any segregable portions that can be released.

If fees will be charged for this request, please provide an estimate before proceeding. I understand fees must be reasonable and limited to actual costs directly attributable to supervising examination and providing copies.

If this request is denied in whole or in part, please provide a written explanation. I reserve the right to file a complaint with the Iowa Public Information Board if necessary.

Thank you for your prompt attention to this matter.

Sincerely,
[YOUR NAME]
[DATE]

Note: This request is made under Iowa Code Chapter 22 (Open Records Act).
